title: Project Manager & Software Developer
summary: Led development of a predictive assistive robotic companion for children with motor disabilities.
bullets: Led a multidisciplinary team to design and deliver an assistive robotic system.
Built an adaptive ML system to dynamically tune gameplay difficulty based on user behaviour.
Developed UI and head-tracking perception pipeline using OpenCV and MediaPipe.
Delivered final demo and technical pitch to stakeholders.

title: Data Intern
summary: Prepared and analysed transaction data to support ML-driven document understanding.
bullets: Cleaned and structured transaction-proposal data for ML training pipelines.
Analysed document structure and metadata to support template-learning models.
Evaluated early model outputs to improve consistency and reliability.

title: Private Equity Analyst / Software Engineering Intern
summary: Built ML and data pipelines to improve valuation robustness and acquisition discovery.
bullets: Trained supervised ML models to improve consistency of company valuation scoring.
Built predictive web-scraping pipelines to surface high-potential acquisition targets.
Automated processing of 700K+ records to accelerate data-driven investment decisions.

title: Consultant
summary: Delivered analytics-driven UX improvements and growth experiments for client platforms.
bullets: Led data-driven UX improvements increasing website visits by 85%.
Improved user retention by 49% through experimentation and KPI-driven iteration.
Worked with stakeholders to translate business goals into measurable metrics.

title: Quant / Trading Competitions
summary: Built market-making strategies and tooling to evaluate risk, execution quality, and performance under noise.
bullets: Ran experiments and tuned parameters for stability and PnL.
